channel.title: Funny Ban Appeals
channel.description:
I did a search on this and nothign came up, sorry if this thread has been repeated somewhere... if it was then delete the thread :|
Anyways, I remember seeing a thread like this on Kaitnieks, just post your ban appeals that you did for fun, just to see their response. Of course now all (or most) of their responses are automated. Post away ;D

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

I have seen a double post, maybe a triple but never a qaud! :o

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @h4xx0rz h4xx0rz
item.description:
@h4xx0rz wrote:

lol one time i sent summat in it said “fuck andrew and his gay co-workers, runescape sucks dick” and then it was an auto response it said somethin along the lines of "sorry your ban appeal has been denied, although we in atliacs one final chance. please read over the rules and code of conduct before playing again.- sincerely
jagex[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:13:51 PM[/size][hr]sorry i meant to spell itiliacs and we have decided to give you one final chance[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:15:20 PM[/size][hr]and i was like “what the hell jagex really is gay…” so i decided to play private servers…jsut to piss off jagex…lol then i really liked private servers :-P[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:16:20 PM[/size][hr]i ll make mine in 7331, l0lz3rz 0||3 11|/|3 1 53||1 50|/|31|-|1||6 1|| 11 0f “f()(k 4ndr3w 4nd |-|is g4y c0-|/0rk3rz, r00n5c4p3 5()(k5 [)1(k” and then it was an auto response it said somethin along the lines of "sorry your ban appeal has been denied, although we in atliacs one final chance. please read over the rules and code of conduct before playing again.- sincerely
jagex
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:20:58 PM[/size][hr]sorry wasnt gonna waste my time doin the whole thing = but one time i sent in a complete leet message to jagex i was swearin n shit and they send a emssage back and it said the autp-ban appeal message lmao. i wasnt even appealing a ban jsut screwing around lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @kantom kantom
item.description:
@kantom wrote:

I got banned for macroing so i told them my brother called the police because someone broke into my house and then the police went on the computer and one of them asked my what my account was and the password and then they bound and gaged me and set a macro up cutting yews.

Jagex sent a message back saying i had been banned for scamming, not macroing.

Read full topic

Not a ban appeal, just having some fun with fagex

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @Mod_J Mod J
item.description:
@Mod_J wrote:

I remember when my brother’s account was banned a couple of months ago for cussing out a level 5 player moderator and his friend. He quit for a while, so I decided to have fun with the appeal. I wrote something like:

Dear Jagex,

.,!,,(~.~),,!,.

Yours Truly,
Ekthador

Level 126, top 200 in high scores… haha, he was pissed.

I got a reply straight from Andrew saying the exact same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

something about you wont do it, get some help(sinsirely), we dont take responsibility for your actions, and about how i was lying when i said i was robbed. he was actually mean to me

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

what [quote=“phonnygoblin, post:3, topic:4131”]i said i was robbed and they made me tell them my pass and they left then they autoed on it(then i said ALOT of bullshit about me about to commit sucicide).

appeal denied personal comment from andrew :)[/quote]he say?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 25, 2006, 06:21:49 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Original Daniel, post:7, topic:4131”]getting a new computer doesnt change your ip

and im pretty sure the only ip bans that have been given out were the real abusers, people who had aryan running on 15-20 accounts 24/7

no bullshit on these forums please[/quote]

i know it doesnt im just pointing out that i did get a new computer then i changed it (well i didnt but sum1 else did) and i think it was cause of the getting banned 3 times on 1 comp :)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 25, 2006, 06:23:31 PM[/size][hr][quote=“phonnygoblin, post:3, topic:4131”]i said i was robbed and they made me tell them my pass and they left then they autoed on it(then i said ALOT of bullshit about me about to commit sucicide).

appeal denied personal comment from andrew :)[/quote]

what did he say?

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @AnthraX_Leader AnthraX Leader
item.description:
@AnthraX_Leader wrote:

On my one account when i got banned i got banned for saying selling santa hats 6 mil like 3 times in a row in front of an admin and got muted then days later i got banned permanently i said under appeal i didnt do anything and they sent me about 6 pages of transactions of scamming trades… so they had all that proof but they ban me for spamming lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

getting a new computer doesnt change your ip

and im pretty sure the only ip bans that have been given out were the real abusers, people who had aryan running on 15-20 accounts 24/7

no bullshit on these forums please

item.title: Funny Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

i once said alot of this shit about being suicidal and then when the denied i sent a message saying ‘fuck u bitches’ and sum other shit about fucking thier moms to the gave ur sumat and um i got an ip ban so i sold my comp and got a newer (and better) one for less
